ActEmergency Preparedness Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCIES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 60 - which (a) DECLARES the severe flooding which occured in Nova Scotia in the early spring of 2003 to be of concern to the federal government, and (b) AUTHORIZES the provision of financial assistance in that regard.
